lead.en: a Spanish data scientist and optimization specialist.

about.en: I would describe myself as a very motivated person, towards both my job and my life as a whole. I am very passionate about transforming numbers into knowledge and using them for optimal decisions, while always thinking out of the box. On a personal level, I consider myself to be a very positive person, with an easy smile and full of energy.

keywords.en: In a few keywords: machine learning, forecasting and scenario generation, stochastic and robust optimization, integer and large scale optimization models, R, Python, Matlab, Apache Spark, GAMS, CPLEX, SQL, git.
